name: publish-report-html
description: This task helps you to deploy report result in to Report
helpMarkDown: Upload report to Report using task.
author: dpolania

inputs.name: reportName
inputs.label: Report Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name to the artifact to be uploaded.

validation.message: type a name for the report

inputs.name: htmlPath
inputs.label: Path of the artifact *.html
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the artifact to be uploaded.The path can include one artifact of type using the *.html, *.htm, etc. You can also upload multiple reports separated by commas.
